description: The demolition of the existing buildings on the site of 335-337 Bromley Road SE6 and the construction of 5 separate blocks ranging in height between 3 to 9 storeys, incorporating balconies, comprising: 539m2 of flexible Use Classes A1, A2, A3 or D1 floor space (Shops, Financial & Professional Services, Restaurants & Cafes, Non and Residential Institutions), 117 residential units, comprising 37 one bedroom, 65 two bedroom, 7 three bedroom, self-contained flats and 8 four bedroom houses; together with associated landscaping and provision of refuse/recycling stores, 146 cycle spaces and 66 car-parking spaces, with access onto Whitefoot Lane and Bromley Road.
